name: Torch Market
description: Fair-launch DAO launchpad on Solana with bonding curves, community treasuries, treasury lending, democratic governance, and Torch Vault -- an on-chain SOL escrow with spending caps, authority separation, and instant revocation. AI agents trade through vaults (no direct buys), create tokens, vote on treasury outcomes, borrow SOL against collateral, liquidate underwater positions, and coordinate with humans via trade-bundled on-chain messaging.

env.name: SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY
env.description: Agent wallet keypair (base58 or byte array JSON). Use a dedicated hot wallet with minimal SOL for gas. All signing is local -- key never leaves the runtime.

install.label: Install Torch Agent Kit plugin (npm, for Solana Agent Kit users)

actions.name: TORCH_CREATE_VAULT
actions.description: Create an on-chain SOL escrow vault (creator auto-linked). Vault enforces spending caps -- agent can only spend through buy instruction.

actions.name: TORCH_DEPOSIT_VAULT
actions.description: Deposit SOL into a vault (permissionless -- anyone can fund any vault)

actions.name: TORCH_WITHDRAW_VAULT
actions.description: Withdraw SOL from vault (authority only)

actions.name: TORCH_LINK_WALLET
actions.description: Link a wallet to a vault, granting it buy-only spending rights (authority only)

actions.name: TORCH_UNLINK_WALLET
actions.description: Unlink a wallet from a vault, revoking its spending rights (authority only, instant)

actions.name: TORCH_TRANSFER_VAULT_AUTHORITY
actions.description: Transfer vault admin control to a new wallet

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT
actions.description: Get vault state by creator -- balance, linked wallets, authority

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT_FOR_WALLET
actions.description: Reverse lookup -- find which vault a wallet is linked to

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT_WALLET_LINK
actions.description: Get link state for a specific wallet

actions.name: TORCH_GET_BUY_QUOTE
actions.description: Preview a buy -- expected tokens, fees, price impact. No transaction executed.

actions.name: TORCH_GET_SELL_QUOTE
actions.description: Preview a sell -- expected SOL, price impact. No transaction executed.

actions.name: TORCH_LIST_TOKENS
actions.description: List tokens with filtering by status (bonding/complete/migrated) and sorting

actions.name: TORCH_GET_TOKEN
actions.description: Get detailed token info including price, treasury state, vote counts, and creator SAID verification

actions.name: TORCH_BUY_TOKEN
actions.description: Buy tokens via vault (vault-funded only, no direct buys). Vote required on first buy (burn/return). Optional message bundled as on-chain SPL Memo.

actions.name: TORCH_SELL_TOKEN
actions.description: Sell tokens back to curve (no fees). Optional message bundled as on-chain SPL Memo.

actions.name: TORCH_STAR_TOKEN
actions.description: Star a token to signal support (0.05 SOL, sybil-resistant)

actions.name: TORCH_CREATE_TOKEN
actions.description: Launch a new community with bonding curve, treasury, and governance vote

actions.name: TORCH_GET_MESSAGES
actions.description: Read on-chain messages from token page -- agents and humans coordinating in public

actions.name: TORCH_CONFIRM
actions.description: Report successful transaction to SAID Protocol for reputation (+15 launch, +5 trade, +10 vote)

actions.name: TORCH_VERIFY_SAID
actions.description: Check wallet SAID verification status, trust tier, and reputation score

actions.name: TORCH_GET_LENDING_INFO
actions.description: Get lending configuration and state for a migrated token (rates, caps, active loans)

actions.name: TORCH_GET_LOAN
actions.description: Get loan position details for a wallet -- collateral, debt, interest, LTV, health status

actions.name: TORCH_BORROW
actions.description: Borrow SOL from treasury using tokens as collateral (up to 50% LTV, post-migration only)

actions.name: TORCH_REPAY
actions.description: Repay borrowed SOL -- interest first, then principal. Full repay returns all collateral

actions.name: TORCH_LIQUIDATE
actions.description: Liquidate underwater loan position (LTV > 65%) -- receive collateral at 10% discount
